description.action: As an owl, flies overhead with wings spread wide, scouting the escape route and looking down at his friends below.
In his dinosaur form, runs swiftly past the stunned guards with determined stride, his small but fierce form moving quickly.
As a koala, runs alongside Aaron with surprising speed and agility, his fluffy form bounding past the confused guards.
In her panda form, runs swiftly with the group, her black and white form moving gracefully as she escapes.
Stands frozen in stunned confusion, spear lowered, watching the transformed children escape with a bewildered expression.
Also stunned and confused, holds his spear loosely while staring in disbelief at the escaping animal children, too shocked to react quickly.
